column4: Hi All, I've got a fresh install of 10.04 but the grub menu does not appear by default - it boot into the OS directly. How do I get the menu to appear? I've checked it's installed by using grub-install -v
ubuntu is only OS in the machine? Hold shift during boot, that will enter the grub menu
- it is the only installed OS - I tried the Shift key & nothing happened
It should though. I don't know of other options
